remarks: A linear functional is a function from vectors to scalars.  ( ~ lnfnfi analog.)  (Contributed by NM, 15-Apr-2014.)
statement:
lflf.d $e |- D = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
lflf.k $e |- K = ( Base ` D ) $.
lflf.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
lflf.f $e |- F = ( LFnl ` W ) $.
lflf $p |- ( ( W e. X /\ G e. F ) -> G : V --> K ) $.
